abstract.t: Somecast is a multi-point delivery technology that allows a packet tobe sent to a set of destinations. Somecast delivery means that thenetwork delivers one copy of a packet to each destination listed inthe packet. Somecast can be used in small multi-user sessions, suchas multimedia conferences and multiplayer games, or used with endhostmulticast for larger sessions. This document describes a possibleimplementation of somecast in IPv4. Somecast is implemented by usingan IPv4 header option that includes a list of up to 9 additionaldestination addresses. This document also describes how somecast canbe incrementally deployed.
